alert.note: Alert for Irion; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 8:53PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Tom Green and northern Irion Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 851 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over San Angelo State Park, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Angelo, Mertzon, Wall, San Angelo State Park, Twin Buttes Reservoir, Water Valley, Grape Creek, Goodfellow Air Force Base, Mereta, Carlsbad, Veribest, Knickerbocker, Arden, Vancourt, Lake Nasworthy, and Tankersley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
